name: glomper
overview:
Glomper is a fun way to share life activities with friends through series of events.

Glomper is designed to help you easily find out what your friends and people nearby are up to tonight, involve into their activities and share your own. Let people know where you’re going, or find out who’s already there through check-ins and the ability to RSVP. Flexible privacy means you can control who sees what you share!

Want to create your own party, meetup or dinner and invite friends? Glomper makes it simple to plan, share and update your events and check who is going before they start.

Once the party is started you can use Glomper Events app to post to Facebook any emotions, pictures and comments and this will become a part of the event timeline. The timeline contains emotions and pictures from all users and is accessible via both web and mobile versions even after the party is over.

Check out the offline mode - you can keep posting even when you are on a plane. When the internet connection appears, all your posts and events will be synchronized immediately.

With Glomper Events app it’s easy to: ✓ Find a nearby party or any other event and join it ✓ Check what your friends are up to ✓ Create your own event and invite people from Facebook ✓ Add pictures, likes and comments during the event ✓ See real-time updates on the event ✓ Keep posting even when there is no connection

Additional Features: ☆ 100% free custom designed filters for your photos ☆ Instant sharing to Facebook ☆ Unlimited uploads

glomper on Facebook: http://facebook.com/glomper
